item.title: Third Time's the Charm
item.description: Hello Reader! which is probably just me. # This is day the Third and my little tweaks here and there are working and the “blog” as a whole works. I trained shoulders today. Ate some eggs and I can do about 30 pushups now, continuously. I still have a ton of work to do. I thought It’ll be fun to explore markdown’s features today so here is an image

item.title: Second Day
item.description: Adding a second blog # I’m adding a second one to this thing to see how it looks. the theme looks fine on all types of screens, Desktop, mobile, etc.

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello there! # This is my blog, my corner of the internet where I can share my stuff.
